author: Zachary Warmbrodt
title: Shake Shack to return small business loan after uproar
description: Other chains that reported receiving the loans include Potbelly, Ruth's Hospitality Group, Taco Cabana and J. Alexander's.
content:
A Shake Shake restaurant
WASHINGTON Shake Shack plans to return a $10 million loan it received under an emergency small business rescue program, amid a growing backlash against big businesses that got the money before $350 billion in funding lapsed last week… [+2413 chars]
